LanguageData.ForceOffArmbinder.label: force off armbinder
LanguageData.ForceOffArmbinder.description: Forcibly removes an armbinder without the key at the cost of significant damage to the wearer.
LanguageData.ForceOffGag.label: force off gag
LanguageData.ForceOffGag.description: Forcibly removes a gag without the key at the cost of significant damage to the wearer.
LanguageData.ForceOffChastityBelt.label: force off chastity belt
LanguageData.ForceOffChastityBelt.description: Forcibly removes a chastity belt without the key at the cost of significant damage to the wearer.
